name: Salamander
ability: Normal attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Burn

additional_data.description: The spiritual embodiment of fire, one of the four major elements. Hot enough to burn all that touch her, even a block of ice would turn to steam at the slightest touch. Because of this, Salamander specializes in missions in scorching hot environments, such as volcano craters. Participating in the annual fireworks festival, Salamander's rockets, known for their phenomenal power, are popular with spectators.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 02/08/17 - 09/08/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 02/08/17 - 09/08/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 09/08/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "I'm on fire! ...Oh, guess I was born that way."
